Research Interests  
My research interests are in the area of computer vision, deep learning. I have done research on face  
recognition, object detection and metric learning. Currently, I am interested in various topics in com-  
puter vision (e.g., scene understanding, person re-identiﬁcation, self-supervised learning), intending to do  
research in a speciﬁc topic in the future.
